name: @sylphx/lens-nuxt
description: Nuxt 3 integration for Lens API framework

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --external vue --external nuxt --external @sylphx/lens-vue --external @sylphx/lens-client && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir ./dist

author: SylphxAI
